name: ST_NONE
description: can be used as a null output or input. Guaranteed to stay at RCSIGNAL_NEUTRAL
General signals

name: ST_YAW
description: Steering / Rudder / Yaw signal

name: ST_THROTTLE
description: overall throttle

name: ST_THROTTLE_RIGHT
description: for tracked vehicles, this is the trottle for the left track.

name: ST_THROTTLE_LEFT
description: for tracked vehicles, this is the trottle for the left track.

name: ST_ROLL
description: Roll signal

name: ST_PITCH
description: Pitch signal

name: ST_SPEED
description: ProcEngineGear can use it as input and creates it also as output. Max speed is max RPM on the highest gear. So half speed signal means half maximum speed.

name: ST_AUX1
description: Signal without special meaning. Can be freely used.

name: ST_AUX2
description: Signal without special meaning. Can be freely used.

name: ST_IGNITION
description: Positive signal will start the engine.

name: ST_BRAKE
description: Positive signal will activate brakes.

name: ST_PARKING_BRAKE
description: Positive signal will activate parking brake.

name: ST_GEAR
description: The current selected gear, 0 meaning neutral gear. -1 is the first rear-gear.

name: ST_TRAILER_SWITCH
description: Trailer switch (meaning trailer is connected)

name: ST_VCC
description: Battery input voltage in 100th Volt

name: ST_TEMP1
description: Temperature sensor 1 (if available) in C

name: ST_TEMP2
description: Temperature sensor 2 (if available) in C
Engine Simulation

name: ST_ENGINE_LOAD
description: Additional engine load in kW. This will be substracted from the engine energy. Note: it's in kilo Watts!

name: ST_RPM
description: Engine RPM in revolutions per min (only positive)
Lights

name: ST_LI_INDICATOR_LEFT
description: Left turn indicator input

name: ST_LI_INDICATOR_RIGHT
description: Right turn indicator input

name: ST_LI_HAZARD
description: A danger indication (left and right turn indicator) input

name: ST_FOG
description: Fog light (front and back)

name: ST_CABIN
description: Cabin light

name: ST_ROOF
description: Roof light

name: ST_BEACON
description: Beacon (flashing emergency) light input

name: ST_BEACON1
description: Beacon (flashing emergency) light. Can be used as output

name: ST_BEACON2
description: Beacon (flashing emergency) light. Can be used as output

name: ST_SIDE
description: Side light input (as in a trailer)

name: ST_HIGHBEAM
description: A highbeam front light. Usually generated by ProcAuto

name: ST_LOWBEAM
description: A lowbeam front light. Usually generated by ProcAuto

name: ST_TAIL
description: the red rear light output. Usually generated by ProcAuto

name: ST_INDICATOR_LEFT
description: Left turn indicator output

name: ST_INDICATOR_RIGHT
description: Right turn indicator output

name: ST_REVERSING
description: The white reversing light. Usually generated by ProcAuto

name: ST_SHAKER
description: Shaker motor output
Sound output

name: ST_MASTER_VOLUME
description: The master volume. Audio output will apply this.

name: ST_HORN
description: Honking signal.

name: ST_SIREN
description: A siren signal such as in an ambulance.

name: ST_SHIFTING
description: Sound output shifting. Generated by ProcAuto.

name: ST_GUN
description: True if a shot is triggered (e.g. tank cannon or MG)

name: ST_FAN
description: Sound volume for a fan (e.g. cooling fan).

name: ST_TURBO
description: Sound volume for a turbo and/or wastegate.

name: ST_HYDRAULIC
description: Sound volume for the hydraulic fluid hissing.

name: ST_TRACK_RATTLE
description: Sounds from tracked vehicles (todo: train tracks?)

name: ST_BUCKET_RATTLE
description: bucket rattle sound if moved fast

name: ST_TIRES
description: Tires squeeling

name: ST_FUEL_EMPTY
description: Out of fuel sample
Servo outputs

name: ST_WINCH
description: Winch signal.

name: ST_COUPLER
description: coupler (5th. wheel)
Excavator

name: ST_EX_BUCKET
description: Signal for bucket movement. This is not the absolute bucket position but instead the bucket movement.

name: ST_EX_DIPPER
description: Movement signal for excavator dipper arm.

name: ST_EX_BOOM
description: Movement signal for excavator boom.

name: ST_EX_SWING
description: Movement signal for excavator arm swing.
